UPDATE OrderDetails SET quantity = quantity + 2, subtotal = (quantity + 2) * (SELECT p.unit_price FROM Products p WHERE p.product_id = 'f5d58e7e-0a62-4b13-bd91-ff24c13b6c4f') WHERE order_id = 'b5b7b9c7-0e14-4a1a-9e12-3d0966a9c78a' AND product_id = 'f5d58e7e-0a62-4b13-bd91-ff24c13b6c4f';
